[胸]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *qʰoŋ ): semantic 肉 ( “ meat ” ) + phonetic 匈 ( OC *qʰoŋ ) . 匈 is the original form of this character, with 肉 added later.

[脑]
Simplified from 腦 ( 𡿺 → 㐫 )

[腦]
Originally 匘 , an ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 匕 + 巛 ( “ hair ” ) + 囟 ( “ head; fontanel ” ) . 匕 was later replaced with 肉 (“flesh”).
